title: Input schema for Harvard Catalyst Profiles Scraper
description: Scrape profiles from Harvard Catalyst Profiles directory with optional filters

searchKeywords.title: Search Keywords
searchKeywords.description: Keywords to search for in profiles (e.g., 'cancer research', 'neuroscience'). Leave empty to get all profiles.

maxItems.title: Maximum Items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of profiles to scrape (50-30000). Each run is independent.
